title: Watch: Moment when Elon Musk raises hand as 'George Soros of the Right'
content: ​Poles apart on politics, Musk accused Soros of trying to destroy Western civilization. Musk said Soros has been using his fortune to control narratives, shape public opinion and push his own political agenda. Musk said Soros funds progressive causes and media outlets to steer society away from open debate and true freedom.
summary: ​Poles apart on politics, Musk accused Soros of trying to destroy Western civilization. Musk said Soros has been using his fortune to control narratives, shape public opinion and push his own political agenda. Musk said Soros funds progressive causes and media outlets to steer society away from open debate and true freedom.

title: 7 killed after car bomb accidently explodes in a former stronghold of the Pakistani Taliban
'Sex in Michelle's bathroom': Book claims Secret Service agent invited lover to Obamas' Hawaii mansion
content: A self-published author alleged that a Secret Service agent, tasked with protecting the Obamas, brought her to their Hawaiian residence without authorization in 2022. The agent, later fired after an internal investigation, reportedly suggested they engage in sex in Michelle Obama's bathroom. The author revealed that she contacted with the agent's boss and told them about his double life.
summary: A self-published author alleged that a Secret Service agent, tasked with protecting the Obamas, brought her to their Hawaiian residence without authorization in 2022. The agent, later fired after an internal investigation, reportedly suggested they engage in sex in Michelle Obama's bathroom. The author revealed that she contacted with the agent's boss and told them about his double life.

title: Lahore reports over 15,000 respiratory cases in one day due to toxic haze, Nasa shares smog photo
content: Lahore, Pakistan, is grappling with hazardous smog, recording a pollution index of 1165. Hospitals are overwhelmed with respiratory illness cases, exceeding 15,000 in a day. The severe air pollution, attributed to industrial emissions and other factors, has prompted school closures, outdoor activity bans, and emergency measures by authorities.
summary: Lahore, Pakistan, is grappling with hazardous smog, recording a pollution index of 1165. Hospitals are overwhelmed with respiratory illness cases, exceeding 15,000 in a day.  The severe air pollution, attributed to industrial emissions and other factors, has prompted school closures, outdoor activity bans, and emergency measures by authorities.

title: COP29 host Azerbaijan says doors 'still open' after spat with France
Sri Lanka snap elections: What’s at stake for the island nation dealing with economic crisis
content: Sri Lankans are voting in a parliamentary election that could give President Anura Kumara Dissanayake the mandate to implement his reform agenda as the country seeks to recover from a crippling economic crisis. Dissanayake's left-leaning party is vying for a majority against a fractured opposition, with the outcome holding significant implications for Sri Lanka's economic policies and international relations.
summary: Sri Lankans are voting in a parliamentary election that could give President Anura Kumara Dissanayake the mandate to implement his reform agenda as the country seeks to recover from a crippling economic crisis. Dissanayake's left-leaning party is vying for a majority against a fractured opposition, with the outcome holding significant implications for Sri Lanka's economic policies and international relations.

title: 'Standing ovation!': Donald Trump and Elon Musk’s performance of 'God Bless America' takes social media by storm
content: A video of Donald Trump singing 'God Bless America' with Elon Musk and Christopher Macchio at Mar-a-Lago has gone viral. The performance followed Trump's announcement that Musk would head the Department of Government Efficiency "DOGE" in his administration. The video sparked enthusiastic reactions on social media, with many expressing joy and anticipation for Trump's presidency.
summary: A video of Donald Trump singing 'God Bless America' with Elon Musk and Christopher Macchio at Mar-a-Lago has gone viral. The performance followed Trump's announcement that Musk would head the Department of Government Efficiency "DOGE" in his administration. The video sparked enthusiastic reactions on social media, with many expressing joy and anticipation for Trump's presidency.

title: 'Who else thinks Biden voted for Trump?': How social media reacted to president's joyful Oval Office meeting
content: President Joe Biden appeared cheerful during his meeting with President-elect Donald Trump at the White House, sparking speculation on social media. Some users interpreted Biden's demeanor as relief following his party's pressure to withdraw from the presidential race. The meeting aimed to ensure a smooth transition of power following the disputed 2020 election.
summary: President Joe Biden appeared cheerful during his meeting with President-elect Donald Trump at the White House, sparking speculation on social media. Some users interpreted Biden's demeanor as relief following his party's pressure to withdraw from the presidential race. The meeting aimed to ensure a smooth transition of power following the disputed 2020 election.

title: Who is Tulsi Gabbard? Meet the Hindu American appointed by Trump as US Director of National Intelligence
content: Former Democratic congresswoman Tulsi Gabbard has been appointed as the director of national intelligence by US President-elect Donald Trump. Gabbard, who switched to the Republican Party, is a staunch Trump supporter and shares his skeptical views on foreign policy. Her appointment reflects Trump's intention to reform intelligence agencies, which he has accused of interference and corruption.
summary: Former Democratic congresswoman Tulsi Gabbard has been appointed as the director of national intelligence by US President-elect Donald Trump. Gabbard, who switched to the Republican Party, is a staunch Trump supporter and shares his skeptical views on foreign policy. Her appointment reflects Trump's intention to reform intelligence agencies, which he has accused of interference and corruption.

title: Dogecoin soars after Trump election win: What you need to know
content: Dogecoin, the cryptocurrency inspired by a meme, has experienced a surge in value following Donald Trump's presidential victory and his appointment of Elon Musk to lead a new initiative with the acronym DOGE. This initiative, the "Department of Government Efficiency," aims to enhance government operations.
summary: Dogecoin, the cryptocurrency inspired by a meme, has experienced a surge in value following Donald Trump's presidential victory and his appointment of Elon Musk to lead a new initiative with the acronym DOGE. This initiative, the "Department of Government Efficiency," aims to enhance government operations.

title: As Dhaka cosies up to Pak, cargo ship from Karachi arrives at Bangladesh port
content: A cargo ship from Karachi docked at Chattogram port, inaugurating the first direct maritime link between Pakistan and Bangladesh. This move by Bangladesh's interim government signals a strengthening of ties with Pakistan, despite the sensitive history between the two nations surrounding the 1971 Liberation War.
summary: A cargo ship from Karachi docked at Chattogram port, inaugurating the first direct maritime link between Pakistan and Bangladesh. This move by Bangladesh's interim government signals a strengthening of ties with Pakistan, despite the sensitive history between the two nations surrounding the 1971 Liberation War.

title: King Charles turns 76: Here’s how the royal plans to celebrate
content: King Charles will celebrate his 76th birthday by launching two food distribution centres as part of his 'Coronation Food Project'. The initiative aims to combat food waste and support charities feeding those in need. The King will visit a London hub and virtually open another in northern England. The project has already saved 940 tonnes of surplus food, providing over 2.2 million meals.
summary: King Charles will celebrate his 76th birthday by launching two food distribution centres as part of his 'Coronation Food Project'. The initiative aims to combat food waste and support charities feeding those in need. The King will visit a London hub and virtually open another in northern England. The project has already saved 940 tonnes of surplus food, providing over 2.2 million meals.

title: Former US Solicitor General Ted Olson who fought for same-sex marriage, dies at 84
One dead after explosion takes place outside Brazil's Supreme Court
Trump appoints Tulsi Gabbard as director of national intelligence
content: Donald Trump has chosen former Democratic Congresswoman Tulsi Gabbard for a surprising role as Director of National Intelligence. Trump praised Gabbard, now identifying as a Republican, for her two decades of service and broad support. Gabbard, who represented Hawaii's 2nd congressional district, left the Democratic Party in 2022, criticizing its stance on war and military intervention.
summary: Donald Trump has chosen former Democratic Congresswoman Tulsi Gabbard for a surprising role as Director of National Intelligence. Trump praised Gabbard, now identifying as a Republican, for her two decades of service and broad support. Gabbard, who represented Hawaii's 2nd congressional district, left the Democratic Party in 2022, criticizing its stance on war and military intervention.

title: Trump nominates Senator Marco Rubio for US secretary of state
content: US President-elect Donald Trump has nominated Senator Marco Rubio for the position of United States Secretary of State. Trump praised Rubio as a "fearless warrior" and a staunch advocate for the nation. Born to Cuban immigrants, Rubio's political journey includes serving as a city commissioner, speaker of the Florida House of Representatives, and a three-term US Senator.
summary: US President-elect Donald Trump has nominated Senator Marco Rubio for the position of United States Secretary of State. Trump praised Rubio as a "fearless warrior" and a staunch advocate for the nation. Born to Cuban immigrants, Rubio's political journey includes serving as a city commissioner, speaker of the Florida House of Representatives, and a three-term US Senator.

title: Bluesky grows as an alternative to X. Is Musk's support for Trump the reason?
content: Following Elon Musk's reaffirmed support for President-elect Donald Trump on X, Bluesky, a rival social media platform, has seen a surge in new users. Over a million new members, primarily from the US, Canada, and Britain, have joined Bluesky since the election.
summary: Following Elon Musk's reaffirmed support for President-elect Donald Trump on X, Bluesky, a rival social media platform, has seen a surge in new users. Over a million new members, primarily from the US, Canada, and Britain, have joined Bluesky since the election.

title: US December 2024 visa bulletin: Employment-based and family-sponsored green card updates for India
content: The latest US visa bulletin brought mixed news for Indian nationals seeking employment-based green cards. While EB-1 remains unchanged, EB-2 and EB-3 categories saw slight advancements. However, significant backlogs persist, particularly for those from India. The bulletin also provides crucial information on family-sponsored green card categories and their respective priority dates.
summary: The latest US visa bulletin brought mixed news for Indian nationals seeking employment-based green cards. While EB-1 remains unchanged, EB-2 and EB-3 categories saw slight advancements. However, significant backlogs persist, particularly for those from India. The bulletin also provides crucial information on family-sponsored green card categories and their respective priority dates.
